Name: The Throne Room
Description: A grand hall with high ceilings and ornate tapestries. At the far end sits King Sulayman on his golden throne, watching you approach.

NPCs.Name: King Sulayman
Texts: Greetings, brave adventurer! Dark times have fallen upon our land. The Time Eater, an ancient evil, has awakened in the North Seaside Cave. Will you help us?
